tweets.content:
His name will be Valentine, after the protagonist in Stranger in a Strange Land, the Heinlein book where our AI name “Grok” was created.

To Grok something means to understand deeply and empathetically.
Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in
I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter, because that is what free speech means
The future is gonna be so

combined_text: His name will be Valentine, after the protagonist in Stranger in a Strange Land, the Heinlein book where our AI name “Grok” was created. To Grok something means to understand deeply and empathetically. Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in 13 Jul 2024 I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter, because that is what free speech means The future is gonna be so Let’s make Twitter maximum fun! Yesss!!!
summary: My AI will be named Grok, as in Grokking things, to understand them more deeply. Will buy Coke to make it better for 15 Mar 2024. Hope my critics still exist. #TwitterFun#TweetingFun
